title: San and Serif for Comet
content:
I'm trying to identify the serif face used in the "working" part and the sans used for the logo; Really anything similar to either of them.

Thanks

[http://i13.tinypic.com/6ge9ldw.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194748/http:/i13.tinypic.com/6ge9ldw.jpg "http://i13.tinypic.com/6ge9ldw.jpg")
author: voiceof

comments.content: The sans looks like Gill Sans Bold to me

Edit.

I think it may be Joanna by Eric Gill?  
Someone confirm...

The serif isn’t Joanna, although it would make sense.

I think it’s Minion.
